Console: PS4

I've noticed that camera panning is really slow in the VAB and the SPH which hinders my ability to build things in any reasonable amount of time. I was wondering if the community new something that I didn't or some control that I wasn't using to pan the camera faster? Maybe its just on a slow setting? I can't seem to figure it out and it really bothers me sometimes when it takes 30 seconds to 1 min just to rotate the camera 180 degrees or raise from the bottom of the rocket to the top.
